application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 4 (Construction Traffic Management Plan) of planning permission PP/24/03555 (Construction of single-storey basement extension beneath footprint of existing dwelling; railing alterations with new external steel staircase in front lightwell to basement level; 250mm raised roof height in line with visible flank wall creasing tile; roof access opening for maintenance accessed via conservation roof light; 10 PV panels installed to roof; rainwater harvesting system and associated green roofs to main and second floor areas; window boxes; widening of front door opening by 150mm overall and associated fanlight enlargement; extension to rear first and second floor level; slated and vertical rear mansard roof; 300mm parapet to second floor green roof)
